Tucson lies back as asked. He couldn't help =
it but he could tell that something in his spark was definitely coming aliv=
e. He had never really gotten into a relationship with a femme bot, due to =
the fact that he knew he was a bit shy when it came to that department. He =
could feel his spark thumping away in his chest, and puts a hand over it. H=
e smiles. 

" The spark never lies."

Gently he takes Talon's hand and puts=
 it on his chest where every beat of his spark can be felt.
